gitBlameOverlay.backgroundColor.description: Background color of the overlay text (hex color, e.g., '#FFD700'). If not set, matches editor background.

gitBlameOverlay.textColor.description: Text color of the overlay content (hex color, e.g., '#000000'). If not set, matches editor foreground.

gitBlameOverlay.borderColor.description: Border color of the overlay (hex color, e.g., '#FFA500'). If not set, uses editor accent color.

gitBlameOverlay.fontStyle.description: Font style for overlay text. Use 'italic' for subtle styling.

gitBlameOverlay.opacity.description: Text opacity (0 = transparent, 1 = fully opaque). Lower values make text less prominent.

gitBlameOverlay.marginLeft.description: Left margin spacing before overlay text

gitBlameOverlay.outputPattern.description: Pattern for the blame output string. Available variables: <hash>, <author>, <authorShort>, <authorEmail>, <date>, <message>. Examples: '[<hash>] <author> (<date>): <message>' or '<authorShort>: <message>' or '<author> <authorEmail>'

gitBlameOverlay.maxMessageLength.description: Maximum length of the commit message in the output (characters)

scripts.pretest: npm run compile && npm run lint
